llm_response.Key Information Summary: Material name is 'Luftschicht' (air layer) with 2 cm thickness, part of a non-loadbearing interior lightweight wall (Leichtbauwand) with fire rating EI60. Other layers include gypsum board, soft insulation, and sand-lime brick (Kalksandstein). The 'Luftschicht' is an air gap, not a solid masonry material.
